line_1: Didst thou roam the paths of danger

line_2: Am I grown so great a Stranger?

line_1: Then mine be the deed, and the danger.
Peace, my Darling, here's no Danger,
line_2: Lo, he slumbers in his Manger,

line_1: And make much Noise at little Danger;
line_2: Would bark at Beggar or at Stranger,

line_1: And knew not fear nor danger.
